doc.field: New York Foundation For the Arts (NYFA) Records
New York Foundation For the Arts (NYFA) Records

This subseries consists of individual application files for recipients of NYFA's Artist Fellowship Program, which include application forms, resumes, work samples, recommendations, artist acceptance agreements, descriptions of proposed projects, and final reports. Recipients represent many artistic disciplines, including playwriting, video, photography, fiction, poetry, painting, architecture, music composition, choreography, computer arts, sculpture, crafts, and film. Noteworthy fellows include Spike Lee, Audre Lorde, Eileen Myles, Andres Serrano, Jessica Hagedorn, Todd Haynes, Barbara Kruger, David Terry, and Dred Scott. Special AFP Programs for fellows, such as the Geri Ashur Film Award, the Catalogue Project for Photography, and Artists in Branches at libraries in New York City, document NYFA's versatility in creating opportunities for artists to further share their work to the public.
